Accessors: Holds accessors for the registered details.
DetailsCache: Add caching behavior on top of Details.
ViewPaths: Helpers related to template lookup using the lookup context information.
formats=:
Override formats= to expand ["*/*"] values and automatically
add :html as fallback to :js.
skip_default_locale!: Do not use the default locale on template lookup.
locale: Override locale to return a symbol instead of array.
locale=:
Overload locale= to also set the I18n.locale. If the current I18n.config object responds
to original_config, it means that it has a copy of the original I18n configuration and it's
acting as proxy, which we need to skip.
with_layout_format: Uses the first format in the formats array for layout lookup.
